Balsamic Shredded Beef

beef
instant pot

Ingredients

Beef

  • 2-3lbs beef roast (tri-tip, chuck, etc)

Sauce Mixture

  • 1 cup beef broth
  • 1/4 cup balsamic vinegar
  • 2 tbsp soy sauce
  • 2 tbsp honey
  • 2 garlic cloves, minced

Procedure

  1. Cut beef into 2" chunks
  2. In a small bowl, wisk together Sauce Mixture
  3. Set pressure cooker to saute on high, get a good sear on a few faces of the beef chunks
  4. Add Sauce Mixture to pressure cooker and scrape up any browned bits
  5. Pressure cook on high for 40 minutes
  6. Natural release pressure for 10 minutes
  7. Transfer meat to a bowl or cutting board and shred.
  8. Add some cooking liquid back to the shredded meat and stir to combine.
  9. Optionally thicken the remaining cooking liquid by bringing the pressure cooker back to saute mode and reducing. A couple tablespoons of a thickening agent like corn starch or flour can also optionally be added for an even thicker sauce.
  10. Serve over rice/cheesy polenta/etc
